column1: Uchi////This place is simply fantastic. When I showed up for our 5 pm reservation there was already a line up down the side walk. We were in a slight hurry
column2: so to avoid having to decide what to get from the extensive menu
column3: we went with the 10 course chef's tasting menu. Every bite was delicious and the chefs beautifully balanced textures
column7: and spicy. Even the courses that were not our favourites were really good. Special mention to the crab dish
column8: and the machi cure (kind of like smoked yellowtail nachos)
column9: as we contemplated ordering seconds of those dishes as soon as we were done. If you get a reservation between 5-6:30 pm Â you can order from the sake social menu and try several dishes without the high price tag. We will definitely be back.
